name: Area 761
description:
You find yourself in a strange place with no windows and no light. When you are there you realize that there are creatures that will try to kill you. The only way out is to complete the missions.

When the creatures are chasing you, you must hide under the tables and turn off your flashlight

If you get killed, you start the game over, unless there is a checkpoint

NOTE: If you know what you're doing, you can beat the game in 10-15 minutes.

If you are playing the game for the first time, it may take you more than 20 minutes

NOTE: If you want to delete the saves you have to go to (Area 761_Data > Data > SavedGame) and delete the files in the "SavedGame" folder
